Text:
Attention! Reviewing this release a correctable mistake was found. The .iso file was written in UDF 1.02 format instead of proper UDF 2.50 one. 
So BluRay players other than PCs/HTPCs won't play the disc. 
Use a program to extract all files from the .iso image and then burn the two BDMV and CERTIFICATE folders with a burning program using proper UDF 2.50. Problem solved.
